title: My account is hacked
body: Hi, my name is Michael and I am 13 years old and my account is keep being played by someone. I can't change my account password because the gmail is old and I don't know it so I need to change the password. Please look at this Discussion and contact me at  ; if you know how to change the Gmail without the original gmail. Thank you.

replies.body: Be sure to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or live chat for account recovery stuff! We don't want your personal info or login info being displayed here for everyone, it's much safer to do these things one on one with us.

I removed your email and name to protect your privacy. If you’re having trouble changing your password, submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com) under the “I’m having trouble accessing my account” or “I need help recovering my account” (or similar) option. An account agent will be able to verify your ownership of the account and then change the email and password for it.
